      • interpolateCosine

        public static double interpolateCosine​(double x0,
                                       double x1,
                                       double factor)

        Interpolate between x0 and x1 based on factor such that: 

         interpolateCosine (x0, x1, 1.0) == x1
 interpolateCosine (x0, x1, 0.0) == x0
        Parameters:
        x0 - The start value
        x1 - The end value
        factor - The interpolation factor
        Returns:
        A value between [x0, x1].

      • interpolateExponential

        public static double interpolateExponential​(double x0,
                                            double x1,
                                            double factor)
        Interpolate between x0 and x1 based on factor, using an exponential scale. When factor == 0, the function returns x0, when factor == 1, the function returns x1. More formally, the function returns x0 + (factorÂ² * (x1 - x0)) .
        Parameters:
        factor - The interpolation factor in the range [0.0, 1.0]
        x0 - The lower bound.
        x1 - The upper bound.
        Returns:
        A value between [x0, x1].

      • interpolateLinear

        public static double interpolateLinear​(double x0,
                                       double x1,
                                       double factor)

        Linearly interpolate between x0 and x1 based on factor such that: 

         interpolateLinear (x0, x1, 1.0) == x1
 interpolateLinear (x0, x1, 0.0) == x0
        Parameters:
        x0 - The start value
        x1 - The end value
        factor - The interpolation factor
        Returns:
        A value between [x0, x1].

      • interpolateLogarithmic

        public static double interpolateLogarithmic​(double x0,
                                            double x1,
                                            double factor)
        Interpolate between x0 and x1 based on factor, using an exponential scale. When factor == 0, the function returns x0, when factor == 1, the function returns x1. More formally, the function returns x0 + (sqrt(factor) * (x1 - x0)) .
        Parameters:
        factor - The interpolation factor in the range [0.0, 1.0]
        x0 - The lower bound.
        x1 - The upper bound.
        Returns:
        A value between [x0, x1].
